Html:
I'm using Graph# and QuickGraph in my WPF application to visualize some diagrams, and it worked fine.

Now I wish the users can edit these diagrams(e.g. add, remove, change edges) by some gestures like drag and click. I have done some researches about this, but didn't find a good way to do it.

Is there a easy way to implement this feature by QuickGraph or Graph#?

Any help will be appreciated.
